data.text: @FoxBusiness All the personal assists of Weinstein should be seized & distributed to all his victims! This guy does not deserve to live a comfortable life for even one minute longer. Now he bankrupts the co., hides &  strips it of assets & cash, prepays his law firm & doesn’t leave a crumb!
@FoxBusiness Absolutely not.  This is a way to avoid the lawsuits that will be filed by the victims.  The entire company should be sold off and immediately set up a fund for the victims
